subject: Simsonn ultimate throtle pedal
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

I hope this message finds you well.

While using the pedals from your company, the sensor mount was damaged and
the silicone on the sensor was worn off. However, the sensor itself is
still functioning properly.
I would like to ask if it is possible to purchase the part shown in the
attachment.

Thank you in advance for your help.

conversations.body_text: Hi kamil Luczyński,    Could you please provide your order number? We will arrange to send you the replacement part.

Hi,

I bought these pedals through AliExpress, so I can provide the order number
from that site.

śr., 9 lip 2025, 00:11 użytkownik service@simsonn.com
Hi kamil Luczyński,    Sure! Please send me your order number.

This is order number from aliexpress: 3053259315725243

czw., 10 lip 2025, 02:28 użytkownik service@simsonn.com
Hi kamil Luczyński,  Alright, we’ve received your order number. Our sales team will arrange the replacement shipment for you and will provide you with the tracking number once it’s available.
Hi kamil Luczyński,  Please also provide a clear high-resolution photo of the side of the throttle so we can identify which version you have.

Hi kamil Luczyński,    It seems there might be an issue with the order number you provided. Could you please send us a screenshot of the order details so we can verify it for you as soon as possible? Thank you for your cooperation!

Ok thanks

sob., 12 lip 2025, 10:41 użytkownik service@simsonn.com

Hi kamil Luczyński,  We haven’t received your reply yet. Please provide the correct order number so we can arrange a replacement for the damaged parts. Additionally, kindly send us a photo of the side of the pedal for further verification.

Hi this is the order number from alliexpres :3053259315725243

śr., 16 lip 2025, 08:27 użytkownik service@simsonn.com
Hi kamil Luczyński,    We’ve received your message. Today, we will send out the two replacement parts for the throttle pedal and provide you with the tracking number once it has been shipped.

Hello, I still haven’t received the spare part for the repair. Could you
please let me know if the package has been shipped?

pt., 18 lip 2025 o 02:05 service@simsonn.com

Hi kamil Luczyński,    Hello, on July 12, our AliExpress operations team could not locate your order number, so I overlooked it at that time. Please provide a screenshot of your purchase record, along with the contact person, phone number, and shipping address, so that we can arrange a replacement directly for you. It seems that your order may not have been placed through our official store; normally, you would need to contact the store where you purchased the item, as they are responsible for after-sales service.  ​
